body.raw:
<edge>
<datacenterMoid>{VAR_MDC}</datacenterMoid>
<name>RBT_EDGE_0</name> <!-- optional. Default is vShield-<edgeId>
. Used as a vm name on VC appended by "-<haIndex>" --> 
<tenant>RBT_EDGE</tenant> <!-- optional. Will 
be used in syslog messages --> 
<fqdn>rabbitmq-lb-0.easpnet.inc</fqdn> <!-- optional. Default is vShield-<edgeId>
. Used to set hostanme on the vm. Appended by "-<haIndex>" -->
<vseLogLevel>info</vseLogLevel> 
<appliances>
<applianceSize>compact</applianceSize> <!-- 
optional. Default is compact. Other possibl
e values are large|xlarge|quadlarge -->
 <appliance>
  <resourcePoolId>{{VAR_MCLU}}</resourcePoolId> 
 <datastoreId>{{VAR_MDATA_STORE}}</datastoreId>
 </appliance> 
</appliances> 
<vnics> <!-- mamimum 10 interfaces index:0-9 
can be configured. Until one 
connected vnic is configured
, none of the configured 
features will serve the network -->
 <vnic>
 <index>0</index>
 <name>LB_NIC</name> 
<!-- optional. Sy
stem has default Names. format vNic0 ... vNic7 -->
 <type>internal</type> <!-- optiona
l. Default is internal. Other 
possible value is "uplink" -->
 <portgroupId>network-18</portgroupId> 
 <addressGroups>
 <addressGroup> <!-- Vnic can be configured to
 have more than one addressGroup/subnets -->
 <primaryAddress>10.0.0.120</primaryAddress> <!-- This is mandatory for an addressGroup -->
 <secondaryAddresses> <!-- Optional. Should be used to add/defined other IPs used for NAT, LB, VPN, etc -->
 <ipAddress>10.0.0.170</ipAddress>
</secondaryAddresses>
 <subnetMask>255.255.255.0</subnetMask> 
 

 </addressGroup>
  </addressGroups>
 <isConnected>true</isConnected> <!-- optional. Default is false -->
 </vnic> 
</vnics>
<cliSettings> 
 <userName>admin</userName> 
 <password>Supernova1!Supernova1!</password> 
 <remoteAccess>true</remoteAccess>
</cliSettings>
<autoConfiguration> <!-- optional -->
 <enabled>true</enabled>
 </autoConfiguration>
  <dnsClient>  
    <primaryDns>10.158.14.1</primaryDns>
    
    <domainName>easpnet.inc</domainName>
    
  </dnsClient>
  
</edge>

<edge>
<datacenterMoid>{VAR_MDC}</datacenterMoid>
<name>RBT_EDGE_0</name> <!-- optional. Default is vShield-<edgeId>
. Used as a vm name on VC appended by "-<haIndex>" --> 
<tenant>RBT_EDGE</tenant> <!-- optional. Will 
be used in syslog messages --> 
<fqdn>rabbitmq-lb-0.easpnet.inc</fqdn> <!-- optional. Default is vShield-<edgeId>
. Used to set hostanme on the vm. Appended by "-<haIndex>" -->
<vseLogLevel>info</vseLogLevel> 
<appliances>
<applianceSize>compact</applianceSize> <!-- 
optional. Default is compact. Other possibl
e values are large|xlarge|quadlarge -->
 <appliance>
  <resourcePoolId>{{VAR_MCLU}}</resourcePoolId> 
 <datastoreId>{{VAR_MDATA_STORE}}</datastoreId>
 </appliance> 
</appliances> 
<vnics> <!-- mamimum 10 interfaces index:0-9 
can be configured. Until one 
connected vnic is configured
, none of the configured 
features will serve the network -->
 <vnic>
 <index>0</index>
 <name>LB_NIC</name> 
<!-- optional. Sy
stem has default Names. format vNic0 ... vNic7 -->
 <type>internal</type> <!-- optiona
l. Default is internal. Other 
possible value is "uplink" -->
 <portgroupId>network-18</portgroupId> 
 <addressGroups>
 <addressGroup> <!-- Vnic can be configured to
 have more than one addressGroup/subnets -->
 <primaryAddress>10.0.0.120</primaryAddress> <!-- This is mandatory for an addressGroup -->
 <secondaryAddresses> <!-- Optional. Should be used to add/defined other IPs used for NAT, LB, VPN, etc -->
 <ipAddress>10.0.0.170</ipAddress>
</secondaryAddresses>
 <subnetMask>255.255.255.0</subnetMask> 
 

 </addressGroup>
  </addressGroups>
 <isConnected>true</isConnected> <!-- optional. Default is false -->
 </vnic> 
</vnics>
<cliSettings> 
 <userName>admin</userName> 
 <password>Supernova1!Supernova1!</password> 
 <remoteAccess>true</remoteAccess>
</cliSettings>
<autoConfiguration> <!-- optional -->
 <enabled>true</enabled>
 </autoConfiguration>
  <dnsClient>  
    <primaryDns>10.158.14.1</primaryDns>
    
    <domainName>easpnet.inc</domainName>
    
  </dnsClient>
  
</edge>

<edge>
<datacenterMoid>{{VAR_MDC}}</datacenterMoid>
<name>RBT_EDGE_0</name> <!-- optional. Default is vShield-<edgeId>

<appliances>

optional. Default is compact. Other possibl
e values are large|xlarge|quadlarge -->
 <appliance>
  <resourcePoolId>{{VAR_MCLU}}</resourcePoolId>

 </appliance> 
</appliances> 
<vnics> <!-- mamimum 10 interfaces index:0-9 
can be configured. Until one 
connected vnic is configured
, none of the configured 
features will serve the network -->
 <vnic>
 <index>0</index>
 <name>LB_NIC</name> 
<!-- optional. Sy
stem has default Names. format vNic0 ... vNic7 -->
 <type>internal</type> <!-- optiona
l. Default is internal. Other 
possible value is "uplink" -->
 <portgroupId>network-18</portgroupId> 
 <addressGroups>
 <addressGroup> <!-- Vnic can be configured to
 have more than one addressGroup/subnets -->
 <primaryAddress>10.0.0.120</primaryAddress> <!-- This is mandatory for an addressGroup -->
 <secondaryAddresses> <!-- Optional. Should be used to add/defined other IPs used for NAT, LB, VPN, etc -->
 <ipAddress>10.0.0.170</ipAddress>
</secondaryAddresses>
 <subnetMask>255.255.255.0</subnetMask> 
 

 </addressGroup>
  </addressGroups>
 <isConnected>true</isConnected> <!-- optional. Default is false -->
 </vnic> 
</vnics>
<cliSettings> 
 <userName>admin</userName> 
 <password>Supernova1!Supernova1!</password> 
 <remoteAccess>true</remoteAccess>
</cliSettings>
<autoConfiguration> <!-- optional -->
 <enabled>true</enabled>
 </autoConfiguration>
  <dnsClient>  
    <primaryDns>10.158.14.1</primaryDns>
    
    <domainName>easpnet.inc</domainName>
    
  </dnsClient>
  
</edge>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<loadBalancer>
   <enabled>true</enabled>
   <enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion>
   <accelerationEnabled>true</accelerationEnabled>
   <logging>
      <enable>true</enable>
      <logLevel>debug</logLevel>
      <!-- valid values include: emergency, alert, critical, error, warning, notice, info, debug -->
   </logging>
   <virtualServer>
      <virtualServerId>virtualServer-1</virtualServerId>
      <name>tcp_transparent_vip</name>
      <description>tcp virtualServer</description>
      <enabled>true</enabled>
      <ipAddress>10.0.0.170</ipAddress>
      <protocol>tcp</protocol>
      <port>5671</port>
      <connectionLimit>0</connectionLimit>
      <applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-3</applicationProfileId>
      <defaultPoolId>pool-3</defaultPoolId>
      <enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion>
      <accelerationEnabled>false</accelerationEnabled>
   </virtualServer>
   <applicationProfile>
      <applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-3</applicationProfileId>
      <name>tcp_application_profile</name>
      <insertXForwardedFor>false</insertXForwardedFor>
      <sslPassthrough>true</sslPassthrough>
   </applicationProfile>
   <pool>
      <poolId>pool-3</poolId>
      <name>pool-tcp</name>
      <description>pool-tcp</description>
      <transparent>false</transparent>
      <algorithm>leastconn</algorithm>
      <monitorId>monitor-3</monitorId>
      <member>
         <memberId>member-5</memberId>
         <ipAddress>10.0.0.171</ipAddress>
         <weight>1</weight>
         <name>m5</name>
         <monitorPort>5671</monitorPort>
      </member>
      <member>
         <memberId>member-6</memberId>
         <ipAddress>10.0.0.172</ipAddress>
         <weight>1</weight>
         \n
         <name>m6</name>
         <monitorPort>5671</monitorPort>
      </member>
   </pool>
   <monitor>
      <monitorId>monitor-3</monitorId>
      <type>tcp</type>
      <interval>5</interval>
      <timeout>15</timeout>
      <maxRetries>3</maxRetries>
      <name>tcp-monitor</name>
   </monitor>
</loadBalancer>
<firewall><enabled>false</enabled></firewall>

<edge>
<datacenterMoid>{{VAR_MDC}}</datacenterMoid>
<name>VCD_EDGE_0</name> <!-- optional. Default is vShield-<edgeId>
. Used as a vm name on VC appended by "-<haIndex>" --> 
<tenant>VCD_EDGE</tenant> <!-- optional. Will 
be used in syslog messages --> 
<fqdn>vcd-lb-0.easpnet.inc</fqdn> <!-- optional. Default is vShield-<edgeId>
. Used to set hostanme on the vm. Appended by "-<haIndex>" -->
<vseLogLevel>info</vseLogLevel> 
<appliances>
<applianceSize>compact</applianceSize> <!-- 
optional. Default is compact. Other possibl
e values are large|xlarge|quadlarge -->
 <appliance>
  <resourcePoolId>{{VAR_MCLU}}</resourcePoolId> 
 <datastoreId>{{VAR_MDATA_STORE}}</datastoreId>
 </appliance> 
</appliances> 
<vnics> <!-- mamimum 10 interfaces index:0-9 
can be configured. Until one 
connected vnic is configured
, none of the configured 
features will serve the network -->
 <vnic>
 <index>0</index>
 <name>LB_NIC</name> 
<!-- optional. Sy
stem has default Names. format vNic0 ... vNic7 -->
 <type>internal</type> <!-- optiona
l. Default is internal. Other 
possible value is "uplink" -->
 <portgroupId>network-19</portgroupId> 
 <addressGroups>
 <addressGroup> <!-- Vnic can be configured to
 have more than one addressGroup/subnets -->
 <primaryAddress>10.158.13.12</primaryAddress> <!-- This is mandatory for an addressGroup -->
  <!-- <secondaryAddresses> Optional. Should be used to add/defined other IPs used for NAT, LB, VPN, etc 
 <ipAddress>10.0.0.170</ipAddress>
</secondaryAddresses>-->
 <subnetMask>255.255.252.0</subnetMask> 
 

 </addressGroup>
  </addressGroups>
 <isConnected>true</isConnected> <!-- optional. Default is false -->
 </vnic> 
</vnics>
<cliSettings> 
 <userName>admin</userName> 
 <password>Supernova1!Supernova1!</password> 
 <remoteAccess>true</remoteAccess>
</cliSettings>
<autoConfiguration> <!-- optional -->
 <enabled>true</enabled>
 </autoConfiguration>
  <dnsClient>  
    <primaryDns>10.158.14.1</primaryDns>
    
    <domainName>gwscloud.com</domainName>
    
  </dnsClient>
  
</edge>

 <portgroupId>network-19</portgroupId>

</secondaryAddresses>-->

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <syslog><protocol>udp</protocol> <!-- Optional. Default is "udp". Valid values : tcp|udp --> <serverAddresses> <!-- Maximum 2 remote IPs can be configured. --><ipAddress>10.0.0.99</ipAddress></serverAddresses></syslog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<staticRouting>
    <defaultRoute>
        <mtu>1500</mtu>
        <description></description>
        <gatewayAddress>10.158.15.253</gatewayAddress>
        <adminDistance>1</adminDistance>
    </defaultRoute>
    <staticRoutes>
        <route>
            <mtu>1500</mtu>
            <description></description>
            <type>user</type>
            <vnic>0</vnic>
            <network>10.0.0.0/24</network>
            <nextHop>10.158.14.3</nextHop>
            <adminDistance>1</adminDistance>
        </route>
        <route>
            <mtu>1500</mtu>
            <description></description>
            <type>user</type>
            <vnic>0</vnic>
            <network>10.0.8.0/24</network>
            <nextHop>10.158.14.3</nextHop>
            <adminDistance>1</adminDistance>
        </route>
    </staticRoutes>
</staticRouting>
<firewall><enabled>false</enabled></firewall>

<loadBalancer>
	<enabled>true</enabled> <!-- optional, default is true --> 
	<enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion> <!-- optional, default is false--> 
	<accelerationEnabled>false</accelerationEnabled> 
	<logging> 
			<enable>true</enable>
			<logLevel>debug</logLevel>
	</logging> 



 <virtualServer>
		<virtualServerId>virtualServer-2</virtualServerId> 
		<name>https_vip</name>
		<description>https virtualServer</description> 
		<enabled>true</enabled> 
		<ipAddress>10.158.13.12</ipAddress> 
		<protocol>https</protocol>

		<port>443</port>
		<applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-2</applicationProfileId>
		 <defaultPoolId>pool-2</defaultPoolId>
		  <enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion>
		   <accelerationEnabled>false</accelerationEnabled>
	</virtualServer> 
	<applicationProfile>
	<applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-2</applicationProfileId> 
		<name>https_application_profile</name>
		 <insertXForwardedFor>false</insertXForwardedFor> 
		 <sslPassthrough>true</sslPassthrough> <persistence>
	      <method>ssl_sessionid</method> 
	  </persistence>
	</applicationProfile>

    <pool>
	 <poolId>pool-2</poolId> 
		 <name>pool-https</name> 
		 <description>pool-https</description> 
		 <transparent>false</transparent> 
		 <algorithm>leastconn</algorithm> 

		 <monitorId>monitor-3</monitorId> 
		 <member>
			<memberId>member-3</memberId>
				 <ipAddress>10.0.8.2</ipAddress> <weight>1</weight>
				 <port>443</port>
				 <name>m3</name>
			</member> 
		<member>
			<memberId>member-4</memberId> 
				<ipAddress>10.0.8.3</ipAddress> 
				<weight>1</weight>
				<port>443</port> 
				<name>m4</name>
		</member> 
	</pool>
	
	<monitor>
    <monitorId>monitor-3</monitorId> 
    <type>tcp</type> <interval>5</interval> <timeout>15</timeout> 
    <maxRetries>3</maxRetries> 
    <name>tcp-monitor</name>
     </monitor>

</loadBalancer>

<loadBalancer>
	<enabled>true</enabled> <!-- optional, default is true --> 
	<enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion> <!-- optional, default is false--> 
	<accelerationEnabled>false</accelerationEnabled>

</loadBalancer>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--PUT https://<vsm-ip>/api/4.0/edges/<edgeId>/loadbalancer/config -->
<loadBalancer>
   <enabled>true</enabled>
   <!-- optional, default is true -->
   <enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion>
   <!-- optional, default is false-->
   <accelerationEnabled>true</accelerationEnabled>
   <!-- optional, default is false-->
   <logging>
      <!-- optional, default is false/INFO -->
      <enable>true</enable>
      <logLevel>debug</logLevel>
      <!-- valid values include: emergency, alert, critical, error, warning, notice, info, debug -->
   </logging>
   <virtualServer>
      <virtualServerId>virtualServer-1</virtualServerId>
      <name>tcp_31031</name>
      <description>tcp 31031</description>
      <enabled>true</enabled>
      <ipAddress>10.158.13.15</ipAddress>
      <protocol>tcp</protocol>
      <port>31031</port>
      <connectionLimit>0</connectionLimit>
      <applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-1</applicationProfileId>
      <defaultPoolId>pool-1</defaultPoolId>
      <enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion>
      <accelerationEnabled>false</accelerationEnabled>
   </virtualServer>
   <applicationProfile>
      <applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-1</applicationProfileId>
      <name>tcp_application_profile</name>
      <insertXForwardedFor>false</insertXForwardedFor>
      <sslPassthrough>true</sslPassthrough>
   </applicationProfile>
   <pool>
      <poolId>pool-1</poolId>
      <name>pool-tcp</name>
      <description>pool-tcp</description>
      <transparent>false</transparent>
      <algorithm>leastconn</algorithm>
      <monitorId>monitor-1</monitorId>
      <member>
         <memberId>member-1</memberId>
         <ipAddress>10.0.8.16</ipAddress>
         <weight>1</weight>
         <name>cp1</name>
         <monitorPort>31031</monitorPort>
         <port>31031</port>
      </member>
      <member>
         <memberId>member-2</memberId>
         <ipAddress>10.0.8.17</ipAddress>
         <weight>1</weight>
         <name>cp2</name>
         <monitorPort>31031</monitorPort>
         <port>31031</port>
      </member>
   </pool>
   <monitor>
      <monitorId>monitor-1</monitorId>
      <type>tcp</type>
      <interval>5</interval>
      <timeout>15</timeout>
      <maxRetries>3</maxRetries>
      <name>tcp-monitor</name>
   </monitor>
   <!-- HTTPS section -->
   <virtualServer>
      <virtualServerId>virtualServer-2</virtualServerId>
      <name>https_vip</name>
      <description>https virtualServer</description>
      <enabled>true</enabled>
      <ipAddress>10.158.13.15</ipAddress>
      <protocol>https</protocol>
      <port>443</port>
      <applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-2</applicationProfileId>
      <defaultPoolId>pool-2</defaultPoolId>
      <enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion>
      <accelerationEnabled>false</accelerationEnabled>
   </virtualServer>
   <applicationProfile>
      <applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-2</applicationProfileId>
      <name>https_application_profile</name>
      <insertXForwardedFor>false</insertXForwardedFor>
      <sslPassthrough>true</sslPassthrough>
      <persistence>
         <method>ssl_sessionid</method>
      </persistence>
   </applicationProfile>
   <pool>
      <poolId>pool-2</poolId>
      <name>pool-https</name>
      <description>pool-https</description>
      <transparent>false</transparent>
      <algorithm>leastconn</algorithm>
      <monitorId>monitor-3</monitorId>
      <member>
         <memberId>member-3</memberId>
         <ipAddress>10.0.8.16</ipAddress>
         <weight>1</weight>
         <port>443</port>
         <name>cp1</name>
         <monitorPort>443</monitorPort>
      </member>
      <member>
         <memberId>member-4</memberId>
         <ipAddress>10.0.8.17</ipAddress>
         <weight>1</weight>
         <port>443</port>
         <name>cp2</name>
         <monitorPort>443</monitorPort>
      </member>
   </pool>
   <monitor>
      <monitorId>monitor-3</monitorId>
      <type>tcp</type>
      <interval>5</interval>
      <timeout>15</timeout>
      <maxRetries>3</maxRetries>
      <name>tcp-monitor-443</name>
   </monitor>
</loadBalancer>

<!--PUT https://<vsm-ip>/api/4.0/edges/<edgeId>/loadbalancer/config -->

   <applicationProfile>

   <pool>

      <transparent>false</transparent>
      <algorithm>leastconn</algorithm>

      <member>

      </member>
      <member>
         <memberId>member-4</memberId>

<edge>
<datacenterMoid>{{VAR_MDC}}</datacenterMoid>
<name>CP1_EDGE_0</name> <!-- optional. Default is vShield-<edgeId>
. Used as a vm name on VC appended by "-<haIndex>" --> 
<tenant>CP1_EDGE</tenant> <!-- optional. Will 
be used in syslog messages --> 
<fqdn>cp1.easpnet.inc</fqdn> <!-- optional. Default is vShield-<edgeId>
. Used to set hostanme on the vm. Appended by "-<haIndex>" -->
<vseLogLevel>info</vseLogLevel> 
<appliances>
<applianceSize>compact</applianceSize> <!-- 
optional. Default is compact. Other possibl
e values are large|xlarge|quadlarge -->
 <appliance>
  <resourcePoolId>{{VAR_MCLU}}</resourcePoolId> 
 <datastoreId>{{VAR_MDATA_STORE}}</datastoreId>
 </appliance> 
</appliances> 
<vnics> <!-- mamimum 10 interfaces index:0-9 
can be configured. Until one 
connected vnic is configured
, none of the configured 
features will serve the network -->
 <vnic>
 <index>0</index>
 <name>LB_NIC</name> 
<!-- optional. Sy
stem has default Names. format vNic0 ... vNic7 -->
 <type>internal</type> <!-- optiona
l. Default is internal. Other 
possible value is "uplink" -->
 <portgroupId>network-19</portgroupId> 
 <addressGroups>
 <addressGroup> <!-- Vnic can be configured to
 have more than one addressGroup/subnets -->
 <primaryAddress>10.158.13.16</primaryAddress> <!-- This is mandatory for an addressGroup -->
  <!-- <secondaryAddresses> Optional. Should be used to add/defined other IPs used for NAT, LB, VPN, etc 
 <ipAddress>10.0.0.170</ipAddress>
</secondaryAddresses>-->
 <subnetMask>255.255.252.0</subnetMask> 
 

 </addressGroup>
  </addressGroups>
 <isConnected>true</isConnected> <!-- optional. Default is false -->
 </vnic> 
</vnics>
<cliSettings> 
 <userName>admin</userName> 
 <password>Supernova1!Supernova1!</password> 
 <remoteAccess>true</remoteAccess>
</cliSettings>
<autoConfiguration> <!-- optional -->
 <enabled>true</enabled>
 </autoConfiguration>
  <dnsClient>  
    <primaryDns>10.158.14.1</primaryDns>
    
    <domainName>gwscloud.com</domainName>
    
  </dnsClient>
  
</edge>

<datacenterMoid>{{VAR_MDC}}</datacenterMoid>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <syslog><protocol>udp</protocol> <!-- Optional. Default is "udp". Valid values : tcp|udp --> <serverAddresses> <!-- Maximum 2 remote IPs can be configured. --><ipAddress>10.0.0.99</ipAddress></serverAddresses></syslog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<staticRouting>
    <defaultRoute>
        <mtu>1500</mtu>
        <description></description>
        <gatewayAddress>10.158.15.253</gatewayAddress>
        <adminDistance>1</adminDistance>
    </defaultRoute>
    <staticRoutes>
        <route>
            <mtu>1500</mtu>
            <description></description>
            <type>user</type>
            <vnic>0</vnic>
            <network>10.0.0.0/24</network>
            <nextHop>10.158.14.3</nextHop>
            <adminDistance>1</adminDistance>
        </route>
        <route>
            <mtu>1500</mtu>
            <description></description>
            <type>user</type>
            <vnic>0</vnic>
            <network>10.0.8.0/24</network>
            <nextHop>10.158.14.3</nextHop>
            <adminDistance>1</adminDistance>
        </route>
    </staticRoutes>
</staticRouting>
<firewall><enabled>false</enabled></firewall>

 </autoConfiguration>
  <dnsClient>  
    <primaryDns>10.158.14.1</primaryDns>
    
    <domainName>gwscloud.com</domainName>
    
  </dnsClient>
  
</edge>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <syslog><protocol>udp</protocol> <!-- Optional. Default is "udp". Valid values : tcp|udp --> <serverAddresses> <!-- Maximum 2 remote IPs can be configured. --><ipAddress>10.0.0.99</ipAddress></serverAddresses></syslog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<staticRouting>
    <defaultRoute>
        <mtu>1500</mtu>
        <description></description>
        <gatewayAddress>10.158.15.253</gatewayAddress>
        <adminDistance>1</adminDistance>
    </defaultRoute>
    <staticRoutes>
        <route>
            <mtu>1500</mtu>
            <description></description>
            <type>user</type>
            <vnic>0</vnic>
            <network>10.0.0.0/24</network>
            <nextHop>10.158.14.3</nextHop>
            <adminDistance>1</adminDistance>
        </route>
        <route>
            <mtu>1500</mtu>
            <description></description>
            <type>user</type>
            <vnic>0</vnic>
            <network>10.0.8.0/24</network>
            <nextHop>10.158.14.3</nextHop>
            <adminDistance>1</adminDistance>
        </route>
    </staticRoutes>
</staticRouting>
<firewall><enabled>false</enabled></firewall>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--PUT https://<vsm-ip>/api/4.0/edges/<edgeId>/loadbalancer/config -->
<loadBalancer>
   <enabled>true</enabled>
   <!-- optional, default is true -->
   <enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion>
   <!-- optional, default is false-->
   <accelerationEnabled>true</accelerationEnabled>
   <!-- optional, default is false-->
   <logging>
      <!-- optional, default is false/INFO -->
      <enable>true</enable>
      <logLevel>debug</logLevel>
      <!-- valid values include: emergency, alert, critical, error, warning, notice, info, debug -->
   </logging>
   
   <!-- HTTPS section -->
   <virtualServer>
      <virtualServerId>virtualServer-2</virtualServerId>
      <name>https_vip</name>
      <description>https virtualServer</description>
      <enabled>true</enabled>
      <ipAddress>10.158.13.17</ipAddress>
      <protocol>https</protocol>
      <port>443</port>
      <applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-2</applicationProfileId>
      <defaultPoolId>pool-2</defaultPoolId>
      <enableServiceInsertion>false</enableServiceInsertion>
      <accelerationEnabled>false</accelerationEnabled>
   </virtualServer>
   <applicationProfile>
      <applicationProfileId>applicationProfile-2</applicationProfileId>
      <name>https_application_profile</name>
      <insertXForwardedFor>false</insertXForwardedFor>
      <sslPassthrough>true</sslPassthrough>
      <persistence>
         <method>ssl_sessionid</method>
      </persistence>
   </applicationProfile>
   <pool>
      <poolId>pool-2</poolId>
      <name>pool-https</name>
      <description>pool-https</description>
      <transparent>false</transparent>
      <algorithm>leastconn</algorithm>
      <monitorId>monitor-3</monitorId>
      <member>
         <memberId>member-3</memberId>
         <ipAddress>10.0.8.17</ipAddress>
         <weight>1</weight>
         <port>443</port>
         <name>cp1</name>
         <monitorPort>443</monitorPort>
      </member>
      
   </pool>
   <monitor>
      <monitorId>monitor-3</monitorId>
      <type>tcp</type>
      <interval>5</interval>
      <timeout>15</timeout>
      <maxRetries>3</maxRetries>
      <name>tcp-monitor-443</name>
   </monitor>
</loadBalancer>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--PUT https://<vsm-ip>/api/4.0/edges/<edgeId>/loadbalancer/config -->

   <pool>
      <poolId>pool-2</poolId>
      <name>pool-https</name>
      <description>pool-https</description>
      <transparent>false</transparent>
      <algorithm>leastconn</algorithm>
      <monitorId>monitor-3</monitorId>
      <member>
         <memberId>member-3</memberId>

      <member>
